snippet.title: shapez 2 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
With the infinite canvas of space for you to exploit, build mega factories to extract, cut, paint and stack increasingly complex shapes.

Wishlist shapez 2 on Steam: https://bit.ly/shapez2-Steam

Find us on our social media:

X / Twitter: https://twitter.com/tobspr
TikTok: https://twitter.com/tobspr
Discord: https://discord.gg/bvq5uGxW8G

Support the game early and gain access to the latest alpha version: https://www.patreon.com/tobsprgames

Learn more about tobspr games: https://tobspr.io/
shapez 2 Press Kit: https://impress.games/press-kit/tobspr-games/shapez-2

shapez 2 is supported by the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action on the basis of a decision by the German Bundestag.

#shapez2 #factory #automation
